Name: Scavenger
About the game: Scavenger is an atmospheric 3D linear adventure with a captivating story about two beings from different worlds. Together with his newly found friend, our hero 'Kiro' explores an underground mine of a long gone civilization in hopes of finding an exit. On their adventure they are met with enemies as well as closed doors which need to be opened.
